title: Bubbles, Bubbles, Bubbles
description: Alexandra has just dreamed of a most amazing experience and cannot wait to get to school so that she can share it with her teacher, Mrs. Gracie, and her classmates. What she doesn't know is that there is a wonderful surprise waiting for her in class. Will her dream come true? Let's read and discover what Alexandra will do today.
author: Casandra Merritt
